title: With Russia Stalling, Agency Refers Valieva Case to Sports’ Highest Court
description: The move by the World Anti-Doping Agency to supersede Russian officials comes amid delays and distrust in how the figure skater’s case is being handled.
dc:creator: Juliet Macur
media:credit: Chang W. Lee/The New York Times
media:description: Kamila Valieva during the Beijing Games in February.
